system.sustained: The Psyker links their mind to a target, flowing power into the target's mind and causing a psychic stroke. Make Opposed Willpower vs Target's Willpower. On success, target takes 1d10 + Psy Rating damage that is ignores non-warded armour and toughness. Daemons, warp creatures, and untouchables are immune to this ability. Should the Psyker fail the opposed test, they suffer 1d5 Insanity Points.
